intro.p: Defines that the target property is a composite key for the scope class

section.title: CompositeKeyAttribute()
section.p: Initializes a new instance of the Castle.ActiveRecord.CompositeKeyAttribute class.

tr.td: Gets or sets the unsaved value.
Gets or sets the access strategy for this property
Gets or sets the custom access strategy
Gets the access strategy string for NHibernate's mapping.
